author: rcm
msg: Added the ability to get extensions about naked objects and its fields.

author: rcm
msg: Added in getting of instances, and searching for instances, where they should include subclasses.

author: rcm
msg: Disposed of Transaction object when a transaction ends.  Also aborted an ongoing transaction when LocalObjectManager is shutdown.

author: rcm
msg: Added authorisation lookups to get hints for one to one and one to many associations.  Refactored out the creation of Hint objects to a class method in a shared class.
